### Problem  - C16 (Page 286) Working within the vector space

\begin{bmatrix} 3 & 4 & 5 \\
6 & 7 & 9 \\
4 & 5 & 122 \\
\end{bmatrix} X \begin{bmatrix} 3 & 4 & 5 \\
6 & 7 & 9 \\
4 & 5 & 122 \\
\end{bmatrix}

```{r  warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Load the library
library(pracma)
# Create matrix for W and B
W = matrix(c(1,2,-1,1,1,0,3,1,2,1,1,2), 4,3) 
B = matrix(c(1,1,0,1), 4,1)

# Merge both matrix into df
data <- cbind(W,B)
# Calculate RREF using R's function
rref(data)
```
